data.title: Marlon Brando's son marries Elvis' "daughter"?
data.text:
MARTY

Post by e***@webtv.net

I sincererly hope that he don't actually believe

http://tinyurl.com/56tr3

And I sincerely believe that Christian Brando is not a rocket scientist and

this Deborah Presley is probably a raving lunatic.

I'm sure they'll have a long and happy relationship. Yeah Right!

Marty

Bill Burk

I sincererly hope that he don't actually believe

that it's Elvis' daughter since there's no evidence to back it up:

I covered Deborah Presley's trial in a MEM court whereby she claimed she was

Elvis' dauighter. Judge threw the case out. Her "proof" was that her mother

told her moms had once confessed to a priest that Elvis was her father !!

I mean, what more do you need than that?

And Christian Brando is also tied into the Robert Blake murder story. He was

somehow connected to Blake's now dead wife, who, by the way, also lived in

Memphis for awhile.

007

--

******************

Bill E. Burk

Publisher, Elvis World Magazine

[Remove "NOSP" from my e-mail address]
